title: How to Make a Lavender After Sun Cream

steps.headline: Pour the moisturising body lotion into a bowl.
Add the two essential oils and mix in well.
Pour the mixture into a bottle for storage.
Use for soothing sunburn and as a general relaxant after sunbathing.

text: Pour the moisturising body lotion into a bowl.  Add the two essential oils and mix in well.  Pour the mixture into a bottle for storage. Label and date. Use for soothing sunburn and as a general relaxant after sunbathing.
